name: Tiny Gravity
description:
Come explore and solve the enigmas on various tiny planets all around the universe !

Concept

In this Puzzle 3D Platformer game you will embody a slime who needs to find technologies for his spaceship to leave his galaxy, for that you will navigate between levels / tiny planets with different environments and enigmas.

You will have in your possession a Gravity Controller which can switch and modify between 3 phases the density of the planet’s gravity that will modify the environment and 3 phases for the player’s character that will modify the player’s body behaviors.

Minimum technical requirement*

*Minimal configuration tested, could work on lower but at your own risk

Recommended configuration

Read the ReadMe file if you face any other issues !
